title: Crispy Idly Fries ðŸ˜‹
content:
Ingredients: Idly - 5 to 8 / as required Oil - To deep fry Garnish -Â Spicy Roasted chickpea Powder / Pappula podi / Bhuna Chana powder Procedure:Â 
  • Make Idly's
  • Let them cool completely
  • Take out Idly' from Idly stand to a plate
  • Dice them
  • Deep fry in oil with medium heat
  • Fry till color changes to golden brown and crispy
  • Take out fried Idly pieces in a bowl
  • Garnish with spicy roasted chickpea powder and give it a toss
  • Enjoy your evening snack
  • Serve it when hot ðŸ˜‹ðŸ˜€
